Reviews.Title: “Exactly what I expected”
Reviews.Author: Samsquamch
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 days simple spend time exploring city staying day comfy bed clean sheets towel day hostel proper hotel location excellent transportation nearby lots shops pubs restaurants underground little noisy morning stay am london

Reviews.Title: “Does what it says on the tin”
Reviews.Author: LordMikey01
Reviews.Content: ive stayed 6 times bed shower loo prices london wont europe money plus dont jack prices days price cleanliness adequate tea coffee unlike european hotels basic breakfast location stop london shower sleep hotel ideal complaint email booking system inconvenient probably secure

Reviews.Title: “if you love bed bugs and cockroaches it's fine”
Reviews.Author: brownowl1960
Reviews.Content: stayed aquarius times time daughter woke 230am crawling bed bed bug force chap reception couldnt night hotel change day started look net else bugs kept appearing daughter packed left hotel 400am thursday morning 18 met cockroach coming understand cockroaches eat bed bugs wasnt bad thursday morning speak manager money refunded didnt insisting clean checked month pest control people paying night london dont told inform environmental health eventually paid night stayed complained left short nights income following 3 nights booked happy sorry wont

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: Dora01
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel bunch class mates wouldnt stay traveling friend etc werent hot water shower barthroom dirty breakfast wasnt special toast tea juice didnt asleep underground outside location 2 min walk earls court st cheap lived cheaper facilities

Reviews.Title: “Stay away from it!”
Reviews.Author: MilenP
Reviews.Content: returned threenight stay aquarius location minute walk earls court station loads shops restaurants cafes pubs stayed floor opposite reception deskthe underground running sleep exhausted drunk clean staff definitely friendly dining cramped packed wait staircase unless breakfast 750 worst found 2 packs cigarettes missing baggage dozen countries europe asia stayed dozens hotels happened meit hard believe id stolen bag yeah cheap includes personal items missing thanks ill
